compatibility.notes: The DocBook-XML license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses, as they may impose additional obligations.

key_requirements: Retain the copyright and permission notice in all copies.
Change the name and version strings of derived stylesheets.
license.name: DocBook-XML
obligations: Include the copyright notice and permission notice in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
Do not use the names of individuals credited with contributions for promotional purposes without prior written authorization.
Identify any stylesheet derived from this Software with a different name and change version strings to avoid confusion.
